contents.text: Welcome to App Academy in San Francisco, where you change your career and only pay tuition once you’re hired as a developer.
For information about our training programs and career services, press '1'.
To learn about our full-stack web development curriculum and course structure, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our curriculum specialists.

navigationGoals: I need a concise overview of the full-stack web development curriculum to see if it fits my schedule.
I want to understand the web development curriculum – course topics, duration, and any veteran-specific accommodations.
Give me a breakdown of your full-stack dev curriculum—coverage of front-end and back-end frameworks, project modules, and timelines.
I need help understanding the full-stack web development curriculum details.
Could you provide specific details about the full-stack web development curriculum modules, prerequisites, and schedule pacing?

contents.text: To hear about career support, job placement rates, and employer partnerships, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our career services team.

navigationGoals: I want to learn about job placement rates and employer partnerships to assess career support.
I need details on career placement support – job rates for vets and employer partners.
Share your employment outcomes—job placement rates, employer partnerships, and career support workflows post-graduation.
I'd like to ask about job placement rates and career support after graduation.
I would like to understand the school’s career support metrics, including job placement rates and employer partnerships.

contents.text: To speak with admissions or learn about tuition payment options, press '2'.
To get details on the application process and enrollment requirements, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our admissions advisors.

navigationGoals: I’d like the application requirements and enrollment deadlines so I can apply quickly.
I want to know how to apply – prerequisites, deadlines, and veteran enrollment procedures.
Outline the admissions pipeline—application prerequisites, evaluation criteria, and upcoming cohort dates.
I want to know the application requirements and how to enroll.
Could you outline the application requirements, key deadlines, and enrollment procedure for the program?

contents.text: To discuss tuition, deferred payment plans, and financial options, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our finance department.

navigationGoals: I’m looking for details on tuition payment options and deferred payment plans to plan my budget.
I'm looking for financial options – GI Bill benefits, deferred tuition plans, and scholarships for vets.
Explain your financial model—deferred tuition plans, income-share agreements, and installment payment options.
I'm looking for information on tuition payment plans and financial aid options.
I want to discuss the total tuition cost and the deferred payment or financing options available.
